description:
Momon is http://anidb.net/ch72785 [Ainz Ooal Gown]`s alter ego as an Adamantite-ranked Adventurer.
Ainz created this persona for the purpose of gaining fame in the Kingdom of Re-Estize and intelligence about possible high level adversaries in the area. He stylized himself as the quiet and enigmatic dark warrior. The iconic raven black armor and red cape has earned his adventurer team the unofficial name of Darkness.
name: Momon
